label: 抜け参り
本: The Structure of the Sekkyo Sansho dayu": Time and Space Sacred and Profane. ACTA ASIATICA, 81 . The Tōhō Gakkai . 2001-09"
説明文: Secret pilgrimage', which liberated employees on their own initiative from their everyday constraints, this time through a relationship with Shinto and Buddhist deities.
